ab2str

(
  • buffer
)
String static

Defined in src/util.js:128

Convert an array buffer containing an encoded string back into a string.

Parameters:

  • buffer ArrayBuffer

    The buffer to unwrap.

Returns:

String:

The decoded buffer.

eachProp

() static

Defined in src/util.js:38

Cycles over properties in an object and calls a function for each property value. If the function returns a truthy value, then the iteration is stopped.

eachReverse

() static

Defined in src/util.js:13

Helper function for iterating over an array backwards. If the func returns a true value, it will break out of the loop.

getBlob

() static

Defined in src/util.js:299

Get a Blob object of a string. Polyfills implementations which don't have a current Blob constructor, like phantomjs.

getId

() static

Defined in src/util.js:76

Get a unique ID.

hasProp

() static

Defined in src/util.js:30

isModuleContext

() static

Defined in src/util.js:287

When run without a window, or specifically requested. Note: Declaration can be redefined in forceModuleContext below.

mixin

() static

Defined in src/util.js:56

Simple function to mix in properties from source into target, but only if target does not already have a property of the same name. This is not robust in IE for transferring methods that match Object.prototype names, but the uses of mixin here seem unlikely to trigger a problem related to that.

scripts

() static

Defined in src/util.js:316

Find all scripts on the given page.

str2ab

(
  • str
)
ArrayBuffer static

Defined in src/util.js:108

Encode a string into a binary array buffer, by treating each character as a utf16 encoded character - the native javascript encoding.

Parameters:

  • str String

    The string to encode.

Returns:

ArrayBuffer:

The encoded string.
